sentences.sContent: If large media and telecommunication companies decide to close their offerings to the web, I am convinced the web will route around it.
sentences.sContent_eng: If large media and telecommunication companies decide to close their offerings to the web, I am convinced the web will route around it.
sentences.sCn: 如果大型媒体和电信公司决定停止向万维网提供内容，我很确信万维网会绕过这一点。

sentences.sContent: He became rich through his well diversified conglomerates which deal with oil, banking and telecommunication business in his homeland, Russia.
sentences.sContent_eng: He became rich through his well diversified conglomerates which deal with oil, banking and telecommunication business in his homeland, Russia.
sentences.sCn: 他在他的祖国俄罗斯通过分类得当的联合企业集团以经营石油、银行业务及电信业务获得财富。

synos.tran: 电讯；[通信]远程通信；无线电通讯

trans.tranOther: the telegraphic or telephonic communication of audio, video, or digital information over a distance by means of radio waves, optical signals, etc, or along a transmission line
